summary:
This mod basically gives you a boss room near the Whiterun castle.
To fight the boss, enter the black door to the left of Dragonsreach.
After killing the boss you can loot a summoning tome from his corpse.
I suggest you bring some friends to kill him.

WARNING: THIS BOSS IS VERY STRONG AND WAS MADE FOR END GAME CHAR
descriptionHtml:
Ever played Final Fantasy XII or XIV? 

Well in them you have Espers and Raid Bosses who happen to be HUGE and tough as hell. 

Anyways, I'm trying to make bosses like these so I made one to see if I have potential to do this. 

This is just a demo version so I would like some feedback about it if possible. 

Also if the community likes it I will try to make a boss dungeon (inspired in FFXIV). 

This mod basically gives you a boss room near the Whiterun castle. 
To fight the boss, enter the black door to the left of Dragonsreach. 
After killing the boss you can loot a summoning tome from his corpse. 
I suggest you bring some friends to kill him.


Sadly, in the end he became simply a Dragon Priest with higher stats, I gave him some crazy spells to use but they made him buggy. I'm still new to modding so it may be just a lame mod. 

If you liked the mod, please endorse!

Requires:

The latest Skyrim version.

Installation:

Just put everything in the Skyrim data folder or use the great Nexus Manager.

Have fun.
author: MarkdoBrasil
